name: Zom (CryptoWingnut)
description:
ZOM is a NFT based TCG world where Zombies battle against rival hordes in turn based strategy to become a hero and lead your horde to victory and glory. This is an early beta build, targeting the Nervos Godwoken V1 testnet blockchain.

Blockchain connectivity is done via Chainlink SDK, and currently provides a testnet reward NFT as part of testing and validations upon successfully completing the basic battle.

Windows 64bit Unity based game.
